## Load packages

```{r}
# Load required packages
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

# Read in the data
whales <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nt246/NTRES-6100-data-science/main/datasets/whales.csv")
whales %>% head() %>% kable()
```


```{r}
whales_long <- whales %>%
  pivot_longer(2:9, names_to = "species", values_to = "info")
whales_long %>% head() %>% kable()
```

```{r}
whales_clean <- whales_long[complete.cases(whales_long[ , c("info")]), ] # Omit NAs by columns
whales_clean 
```

```{r}
whales_clean <- whales_long %>%
  filter(!is.na(info))
whales_clean %>% head() %>% kable()
```
```{r}
whales_clean <- whales_long %>%
  filter(!is.na(info))
whales_clean %>% head() %>% kable()
whales_clean %>%
  mutate(director = strsplit(as.character(director), ",")) %>%
```
